website_summaries.verdict: Featuring an extra-durable frame, a 220lb. maximum load, and a design made to accommodate all ages, the Swagtron T1 is easily the best self-balancing personal transporter available from this manufacturer.
pros: Learning mode for beginners and kids
3 colors available: red, blue, and black
cons: Although the Swagtron is a fun and simple to ride self-balancing personal transporter, you’ll only get an hour of ride time per charge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old grandson was absolutely ecstatic to open this hoverboard for his birthday. He has had it for about 6 months now with no issues whatsoever. It is a perfect "starter" hoverboard as it has a learning mode and a standard mode. He also loves the LED headlights and Mom loves the rubber bumpers! So far it has been everything he hoped for! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend this "hoverboard"
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Battery last a long time, and my daughter absolutely loves it. She has had no problems so far (had it about a month). Everything seems to be working as it supposed to and there have been no issues thus far. I do recommend this "hoverboard"!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Stop working right at the no return time frame. Trying to contact retailer. Too expensive to not work after month! Only used indoors too on hardwood floors. So annoyed and frustrated
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old just opened it and loves it so far. It's on the charger right now so he can ride it. My son LOVES it. He said it's his favorite gift ever. He has been riding it nonstop since he got it. Word of caution it's hard to get on and off. They need a better way of doing this but other then that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: The T1 has a slightly better rating than the T5 but it too failed (started ...
customer_reviews.text: The Swagtron T1 replaced a Swagtron T5 we got over the holidays and malfunctioned after 2 weeks. The T1 has a slightly better rating than the T5 but it too failed (started vibrating excessively when stepped on) and I was lucky to return it to Amazon just before someone got hurt. Something is the matter with this hoverboard company. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: O. K.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a board worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Tried ordering one of these last year and went through all kinds of issues with UK shipping and fire hazard regulations. Finally found this one that meets the safety regulations(as far as I know). Ordered and received earlier than expected. My son is thrilled and has no issue riding at all. Wheels are smaller so not a good choice for rougher terrain, but indoors, driveway sidewalks, concrete and asphalt riding are perfect. I anticipate ordering more for my other kids soon.
customer_reviews.author: Damian H.

customer_reviews.title: Quit working properly within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yo loves this, but unfortunately, it's malfunctioning and doesn't work 80% of the time he tries to ride it now. We have taken very good care of it so it's nothing he did. The first one we got for XMas had to be sent back (big bummer for a kid) but then the replacement worked great for a few months. The problems appear to be widespread per reviews. I'd love to see Amazon/Swagtron rectify this situation. My kid just wants one he can ride?
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gillhaus

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly solid and cool for the price
customer_reviews.text: My saved saved up for this by combining his birthday cash. Now the whole family is riding this thing. For the price, extremely well built and powerful. Rolls smoothly and we've ridden it both indoors and outdoors and also in the garage. This one had LED lights which creste a cool factor. No battery issues so far, which charge it for a couple of hours and then unplug it. We bought this after hearing from a friend they had this brand and liked it. Now I can understand why.
customer_reviews.author: Joe In Portland

customer_reviews.title: can't get one that they say isn't broke
customer_reviews.text: we're on the third one of these, the boards seem to work great and all but there's a rattle on them caused by the washer that's between the two halfs, contacted swagtron and they said it needed to be returned, after getting the third one we finally just got tired of shipping them back and forth and decided to keep it even with the rattle. the phone support people didn't seem like they knew what was even going on, and returning to amazon AND getting the pre-christmas deal we got was a royal pain. hard for me to recommend due to the issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sleekun

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun... Built in safety features... UL CERTIFIED.... Quick... Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: My son couldn't be happier. This little thing is quick. It has a learning mode which slows it down a bit for beginners to get use to it. It also has safety features built in which made me happy. Everyone has heard of these type things catching fire because they're not UL Certified and not protection built in. Well this one has it all. That was it's main selling point to me. I felt safe knowing all the extra features. I've been on it as well(165lbs) and it is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca & Steven

customer_reviews.title: Runs great however the plastic body does not hold up well ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs great however the plastic body does not hold up well at all. The slightest bump on something will scuff the plastic. My son got off of it at one point and it starting spinning in circles, hit him in the leg and hit the couch breaking the whole plastic side off by the wheel. Not to happy about that considering he has had it for only 3 weeks and it cost more than $350.00. You would think for that amount of money, the plastic would be a bit thicker and hold up against bumps just a little better. He can still ride it, but it just looks junky now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s like it’s attached to his body
customer_reviews.text: I think my son has forgotten how to walk. He steps on the first thing in the morning, it’s like it’s attached to his body! Probably the first Christmas present in, well maybe ever, that has actually been used past January. He’s really only on it indoors because we live in the country and so far it is holding up well. Still keeps its charge for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: luckymama

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine...for a bit
customer_reviews.text: Hoverboard worked fine for a few weeks. After the first few weeks though my son turned it on one morning and it just beeps and a little red light flashes, no motor movement or resistance. Tried to recalibrate the board but still nothing. Have contacted Swagtron but still waiting for a response
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Troubles after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This hoverboard was pretty good for the first couple of months, then the system red light started to blink, and the hoverboard wouldn't work unless you reset it. Today, it is not even resetting. It is dead!! I will try to call customer service tomorrow since they were closed today (Sunday).
customer_reviews.author: Abchap

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Product was delivered a few days earlier than expected, just in time for my son's b-day. Comes with a charger, instructions and two rubber covers for the fenders. Just charge and go! It's very quiet and pretty heavy. We've only used it in the house so far, but it seems to be a solid, well-made hover board. Falls off of these things can be brutal, definitely buy protective gear and helmet!!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Bou

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a reward for my 6 year old son with ADHD and autism. He’s now 8. This thing has taken a beating and is shockingly still kicking. It’s rolled down the driveway, lost pieces of its wheel wells, stayed outside all night in light rain. Sometimes it acts a little funky but is always fixed by turning it off and charging it. I’m crazy impressed at how well this hoverboard has held up given the heavy, crazy use it gets from my guy. My 4 year old has just started to show interest in it and seeing him ride the beat up thing prompted me to write this review!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son loved this as a present. We originally purchased him the Halo Board as it was supposed to be the best and it did not perform well for him as a beginner. The Swagtron self-balances perfectly for him and has enough speed for mom and dad to have fun on
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Good product but really bad instructions!?
customer_reviews.text: Terribly written manual. Product is fun. But not as easy to ride as they tout. Will need good core just to stand up on this and keep your balance. It’s fun but not happy with the instructions at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gautam Banerjea

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: The board worked fine for my 12 year old brother for a few weeks. The board stopped turning on around a month ago and the lights just flash when we press the on switch. The purchase was not worth it, this was the worst birthday present I could have gotten him. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Sumelsingh5

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 20 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter (47 lbs) to help keep her occupied during quarantine & after waiting 2 weeks, this item broke after 20 minutes of use. Recieved a replacement from Amazon, after waiting another 2 weeks & sure enough, the second one stopped working after less than an hour of use. Very disappointed 6year old. Swagtron suggested we ship the 2nd board to them for repairs...and wait up to a month to get it back. No thanks, will take the refund from Amazon & go with a different brand. The representative from Swagtron was not friendly at all, Amazon was great & apologetic.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Rose

customer_reviews.title: broke within a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: kids loved this hover board, it is easy to learn and fun to ride. However, it broke within a couple of weeks. the Red light kept beeping (seems to call recalibration), and following the manual instructions to re-set it didn't yield any success, very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Fish

customer_reviews.title: 9 days....broke
customer_reviews.text: it broke 9 days after christmas customer service said to calibrate it....like I wasn't aware instructions come in the box....also YouTubed any known issue and and attempt to solve the issue before even calling and emailing them ... so now I have a 280 dollar paperweight
customer_reviews.author: Luap

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoverboard for my granddaughter's birthday 4/25/19. She was thrilled! Everything worked fine for awhile, but now she is getting a red error message, and has to recalibrate every day. My daughter has reached out to Swagtron for technical support, and gotten no response. Very poor customer service and support.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Poor components, aweful customer support
customer_reviews.text: If you want a crappy power port cover, that breaks within a few days, it indicates a deeper lack of quality. Nice board, would never buy this brand again though. If simple external quality is sacrificed, who knows what the insides are like. Btw: customer service was a robot.
customer_reviews.author: hominid

customer_reviews.title: These are not reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Works for about a month before getting blinking red light. Send it to factory, they send it back. Works for about a month before getting red light. I did not repeat myself... it’s just junk.
customer_reviews.author: Gib

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons Love This
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these hoverboards; one a few years ago for an older grandson and one this past Christmas for a younger grandson. They love them! They are easy to ride and keep your balance, charge fast, and have some cool lights for night time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete scam
customer_reviews.text: This product is a scam. Ours never worked right, then broke completely after approximately 3 months of light indoor use. After it broke we contacted swagtron who instructed us to mail it back to them (at our expense) to be repaired. They have had it for 3 months now with no indication that it is being fixed. We have emailed them; they confirm that they have it, but won’t tell us when it might be fixed. Buyer beware. You are throwing your money away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good board!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! It seems to be well built as it has been used almost daily weather permitting since the holidays. The battery last for a fairly decent amount of riding time compared to the other boards. Charges fairly quickly, overall we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BigEz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and service.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working properly. Swagtron has not been helpful in refunding our purchase. 1 yr warranty, but because we bought on Amazon, they want us to ship it to them and they say they will repair. Garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: Giv

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is awful
customer_reviews.text: Reveied the board 1 day ago and battery lasts 5 minutes... Will start to get customer support, otherwise will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias D.

customer_reviews.title: A pro in 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to purchase cuz everyone said they weren't safe but my 10 year wanted it so bad and I knew we would do our best to keep her safe. She had knee pads elbow pads and a helmet, she was a pro in less than 30 minutes. This hoverboard is amazing I even tried it and it's awesome for adults too. Charges super fast and last long and looks really nice. I would suggest u buy a skin for it cause it does get scuffed up Easily when u jump off to fast it rocks backs nd forth so def buy a skin to keep the actual body in good shape. 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old loves it. It is as described. Only issue is battery runs down before he is tired of it.
customer_reviews.author: Zulu49

customer_reviews.title: Always Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids (ages 7-13) for Christmas and it broke within 3 days. Amazon was cool enough to let me return it and i just swapped it out for the same one, thinking i got a unlucky. I got the second one and it broke within a week! Absurd! I want to return it to just get my money back, but i cant now. Buyer Beware...this product is no bueno!
customer_reviews.author: justin van de graaff

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand, Swagtron is junk.
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. As soon as my kid steps on it, it shakes and vibrates and throws him off it. It is easily the worst hoverboard that he has ever been on, and it has ruined Christmas for him. How Swagtron can release such junk is beyond me. It's a colossal waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: DavidN4

customer_reviews.title: Not great customer service from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but it stopped moving 2 days after Christmas. We tried all the troubleshooting website suggestions but we just keep getting and red error light. I definitely want a replacement. The manufacturer also did not return my phone call. We also suspect it was used before we got it. It was half charged, scuffed, and the bumpers were in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for my grandsons, since these were gifts I have no idea as to how anything works. No complaints From the "giftees," and since there have been no word of broken bones, guess we are okay!! The seller was great,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else to play with!
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning the second one of these with same problems ! 1st seems to need calibrated then everything quits and you can’t turn it on. I would like to fix rather than return again. Third time it will work or be replaced with different hoverboard! But I researched before buying it and thought I would be getting the best one available in this price range. NO SUCH LUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Matney

customer_reviews.title: on the go
customer_reviews.text: This was the best ever gift. No problem for the 13year old to master....looking into adding additional equipment to make into a go cart....
customer_reviews.author: merchandiser

customer_reviews.title: Everyone will want to play with these!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for our boys for Christmas, they love them!! great for winter when they just want to sit around. They do scuff walls, trim and furniture if you don't lay down some ground rules. Came on time, well packaged and work great and they charge up quickly between uses. I was nervous about some negative reviews, but we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof5

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color!
customer_reviews.text: WRONG COLOR ARRIVED!!! It arrived, VERY LATE, almost thought it was lost with the runaround that UPS was giving me. Anyway, it arrived boxed in another box. I had marked BLUE? But was given GARNET. Really don’t want to deal with repackaging and shipping it over again for the wrong color. Plus it’s pretty heavy. So I’m just keeping it. Other than wrong color and lateness, everything’s good. Nice and sturdy, not cheap and flimsy looking. Color, although wrong, is nice. Easy to ride. Perfect for my 10 year old. Almost exactly what she asked for.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My kid rides it like a ninja
customer_reviews.text: Quality unit. Has not caught fire. My kid rides it like a ninja. Forwards, backwards, upside down. This thing does it all. Very heavy, but long lasting and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Mud

customer_reviews.title: Brokedown in 4 months. No response from Support.
customer_reviews.text: The hoverboard broke down in less than 4 months. Wont calibrate no matter what. So it is completely dead after 3 to 4 months of sporadic use. Got in touch with Support while it is still under warranty. No response received. Its been months. Not buying anything Swagtron again. Would highly recommend AGAINST buying this.
customer_reviews.author: bala

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old approves!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 ur old son took off on it as soon as he got it. He had ridden hoverboards at friends homes- so already had some experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this! I bought a cheaper one and the battery only lasted less than 30 minutes. This one goes all day. All the kids that come over love it and fight over it. It’s pricey but they have fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fager

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hooverboard!
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren absolutely love this board. Good battery life. Very well made. Heavy duty. No issues whatsoever. Glad I got this one!
customer_reviews.author: Alison D. Morrisette

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week. Buy a Razor! I bought both and the Razor still works
customer_reviews.text: The hover board charges faster than the razor that's the only positive thought I have now. Our Razor Hover board is still going strong. The Swagtron Swagboard Pro T1 has a problem with the RED LIGHTS OF DEATH. Hope this helps. I'm bummed I spent $275.00 which is $75.00 more than the Razor. Hope this helps save you and your kids save some $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Alan T. Bonn

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for very long
customer_reviews.text: Initially we loved the hoverboard, but after 2 months of normal use, the board started blinking, not charging and eventually stopped working. We spent a lot of money for this gift to only work for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The original and its replacement both stopped working in 2 days and Amazon has been unresponsive.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a swagtron for my daughter for Christmas. She used it twice and then was unable to hold a charge. When I called, it was hard to get a replacement and when it came, the replacement did the same thing. Have been trying to contact Amazon but they are unresponsive and ultimately charged me for both!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last
customer_reviews.text: Battery went dead after only 9 months not covered by warranty . Can only buy battery from swatron . Not Samsung battery . Kevin
customer_reviews.author: peechy6

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My son loves it. The weight limit should be a little higher because my son is in the weight limit but the hover board doesn’t always recognize him on it when he is getting off and on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: 2 and we are DONE
customer_reviews.text: It broke 30 days after we go it. So we thought it was a fluke. 2nd one broke in 31 days. Will never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Caity

customer_reviews.title: but I would highly recommend the Swagtron T1
customer_reviews.text: The Swagtron T1 was delivered ahead of scheduled. It was a birthday gift for my son, and he absolutely loves it! My whole family has been riding it around the house. It's a little pricey, but I would highly recommend the Swagtron T1.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ford

customer_reviews.title: Nice hover board
customer_reviews.text: This hover board is really nice and it works real well but it does weigh 25 pounds but still it is the best but you should buy the sleeve for the hover board for sure
customer_reviews.author: Popoye

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, speed and battery is a good combo.
customer_reviews.author: edward j woodrowski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing. I got on it and I am a bigger guy and it has some giddy up. Would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. KIRSCH

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I will give this less than 1.opened the box cool looking but did not work.Real P.O.S. Big let down I did not pay that kind of money for looks. Junk. Junk. JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: yellowdog

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn left after 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had it 2 weeks and now it won't turn left! Seriously for this much money, you expect quality. My son is so upset. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Mom 24

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson thinks this the best present ever! It took him anout an hour to get the hang of it snd now goes forward, backwards, im circles and evem rides on his knees . He loves the swagtron. UL certified!!###
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Failla

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old saved up for this and loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old saved up for this and loves it! Rides around the driveway and neighborhood. She hopped right on and instantly figured out steering and speed.
customer_reviews.author: pinellas71

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, arrived on time as promised
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, arrived on time as promised, fully charged! Bonus! My son was riding within 30 seconds of opening it on Christmas morning. Like the extra fender bumpers too.
customer_reviews.author: Tpm85

customer_reviews.title: Swagway Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old grandson and he loves it ! Rides nice and smooth and took him no time at all to master !
customer_reviews.author: Juneybug

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got to use it for one charge! About two hours. After recharging it the used it in the hours for about 15 min. The battery started flashing two codes. When I looked it up it said both wheels needed to be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: It works good inside and outside
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it! She uses it all the time. It works good inside and outside. Battery lasts for a while. No issues since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispr

customer_reviews.title: He said it was the best present he ever got and that he loves me
customer_reviews.text: I am a grandmother and just gave this to my 10 year old grandson. He said it was the best present he ever got and that he loves me. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kryka

customer_reviews.title: Not working - Doesn't calibrate.
customer_reviews.text: We used Hover board for less than 3 months and its not working. We tried to calibrate several times and it will not calibrate/align. We shipped the item to be fixed and we are still waiting to get it fixed. I wouldn't recommend this .
customer_reviews.author: Udayasree Ghanta

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old loves it! Its heavy duty ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves it! Its heavy duty and very well built!! Comes with a charger and protective padding!!
customer_reviews.author: naturalpath

customer_reviews.title: Had the swagtron a little over one year and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the swagtron a little over one year and it quit working. For the price we paid, I would expect it to last a lot longer. Our son is heartbroken, he loves his swagtron. I wouldn't buy this one again based on the fact that it quit working immediately after the one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jacey J Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my 12 year old grandson. He's loved it from the moment he unwrapped it - I couldn't believe how quickly he was able to ride it without falling off. Great quality and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M. Rizzuto

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: Brought for three girls for Christmas. They all loved it and had no problem learning to ride. Even mom and dad got involved in riding.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Swagtron T1
customer_reviews.text: The Swagtron T1 was the perfect gift for our granddaughters. I bought 2. My sister bought 3. We are all very happy and would buy them again. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super Happy with our purchase! My son saved his money to purchase this hover board and he is thrilled! Very smooth ride!
customer_reviews.author: Clam2525

customer_reviews.title: loved the product
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr. loved the product. Its been 6 months and no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordering is easier then riding it.....lol
customer_reviews.text: Ordering was a lot easier then riding it. Had no problem with the description on the website when ordering. I was pleased with the ease of getting it. and the product was packed very well. I ordered this one for my grandson but it looks like so much fun, I might order one for myself. Wonder if they come with matching walkers? lol
customer_reviews.author: rbsroomie

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s dangerous to use even with protective gear: helmet gloves elbow knees on the first charge The charger got very hot to be safe i placed a fire retardant carpet under neath
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: This item is very heavy and awkward to pack so I recommend buying a strap or bag if you plan to ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids are loving it and has worked perfectly since it arrived in late July. Requires frequent charging of the battery with use but doesn't take long to charge. This item is very heavy and awkward to pack so I recommend buying a strap or bag if you plan to transport it often.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Mountain Girl

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Safe Hoverboard that is quality1
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good and safe hoverboard. We went through 3 different companies trying their hoverboards but then the whole unsafe fire thing happened where they said people shouldnt by these. However Swagtron came out with the first UL certified hoverboard and it has been great. You dont have to worry about it overcharging and you dont have to worry if you forget to unplug it. The unit works great and has a beginner mode as well. This thing has been getting beaten up by my kids but still works every day unlike the crappy ones I tried from other companies. I highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KJK1414

customer_reviews.title: Love Amazon service! It's worth it to be an Amazon prime member!!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Hoverboard for my daughter for Christmas. It didn't run right since the day we opened it up. Eventually, it just quit working. We sent it back to Amazon and they replaced the hoverboard. Excellent service! I really hope the replacement works for a few years to come!
customer_reviews.author: jmurr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy one ,it won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Second one same problem red light blinks and won’t do anything
customer_reviews.author: Ktmguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these and there have not been any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year!!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only a year! Terrible!! Worked great when it worked and stopped working after a year. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Over priced!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t spend all your Christmas money on this. I ordered this for 260$ then later found a hover board that is the same quality and even has a Bluetooth speaker attached for only 175$ at Oxmoor mall.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Matthews

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems very smooth but disappointed with the run time. 7-12 miles more like 1 mile.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Frey

customer_reviews.title: Works great. No fires after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Works great. No fires after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: 10th birthday Boy loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s 10th birthday and while we have only had it a few days, he LOVES it! Came quicker than originally stated and so far is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. We purchased 2 of these hoverboards- both broke within a few weeks of purchase. Very poorly made!!! Choose a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Gopal Narasimhan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our son's birthday, he LOVES it! Wish they had these when I was growing up.
customer_reviews.author: ARdude

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work after one week
customer_reviews.text: i have had many hover boards and this was great for one week and then just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Gianna Italiano

customer_reviews.title: Made my Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My grandson told me it was his favorite gift. Chalk one up for Papa. I definitely made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Battery life as described by the seller/company
customer_reviews.text: UL certified. Works great. Battery life as described by the seller/company.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. It worked for about 3 hours on Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It worked for about 3 hours on Christmas Day then one side went unresponsive. The Seller is refunding the money but it's costing $63.00 to ship it BACK! Not cool, very disappointed will avoid this seller at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase... well made, runs smooth, exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not working to the expectation
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, but 2nd time it went bad in 2 months. I am expecting they will take it back and return money for it ..
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Z.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift from Santa & when opened it was defective then we were able to get another one ... that came broken . Very disappointing... it kind of ruined Christmas for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.author: Pragya S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get the kids out of the house.
customer_reviews.text: For my son, he love it but his mother not so much!
customer_reviews.author: Willie S Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I thought this thing was a rip off ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I thought this thing was a rip off because of the price but it works great! Reccommended for bday and Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Samad

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, who am I kidding, I love it!!! Its a lot of fun and battery seems to last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday gift ever for an 8 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Best Birthday gift ever for an 8 yr old. She is soooo happy. It appears to be tough and does the job it was made for.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Washington

customer_reviews.title: ... my sons birthday and he said it was his favorite gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons birthday and he said it was his favorite gift ever! Charged very quickly and was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My 11 year old daughter had no problem learning to ride this. Easy to charge. Very sturdy and built to last. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Bernath

product_meta.title: Swagtron Swagboard Pro T1 UL 2272 Certified Hoverboard Electric Self-Balancing Scooter
feature_bullets: Cruise with swag on your hoverboard boasting an 8 mph top speed and 11 mile range - weight up to 220 lbs
UL 2272 certified - the SWAGTRON 2-wheel self-balancing scooter excelled in all electrical safety tests
This swag motorized scooter’s new features include: LED headlights, battery indicators, rubber bumpers, and two riding modes
Patented SWAGTRON SentryShield smart battery management system provides multi layered hover skate-board protection
This balance scooter features an upgraded 250 Watt motor and gear stabilization for tighter control and downhill traction
Range: Up to 7 – 12 miles Charging Time: 1 Hour. Maximum Weight Limit- 220 pounds. Minimum Weight Limit- 44 pounds. Weight-23 pounds
NOTE: Refer the User Manual before use.The loud sound from the wheel is most commonly caused by packing material getting stuck between the wheel and the plastic housing.
